local_intent: Verify cloth visibility, execute a 0.1m push along 180 degrees on the cloth edge, allow settling, and confirm visibility post-push.
assumptions: End-effector is already at contact height from prior steps
Push direction 180 degrees aligns with intended fold line
Workspace around the cloth is clear for the push distance
coherence_with_global: Implements the Push step with identical parameters, includes a brief wait for settling and visibility checks consistent with the global plan and description.
